授業方法: Face to Face Seminar. By discussing real world cases of business success and failure in Japan and practicing cross cultural communication techniques, students will develop a portfolio of best practices in business communication and management. At the beginning of each class students will present a summary of the assigned case study or reading followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor.
